title: The Supervisor's Test
timeline: Day 2, Wednesday morning, 0800 meeting with Kauffman
location: The Vault - Director Kauffman's office, Level 87, then ground level

aria_chen.location: Kauffman's office → ground level → heading toward Undercity
aria_chen.emotional_state: Defensive anticipation → confusion → cautious hope → deepening uncertainty
knows: Kauffman found 17 irregularities in secondary scan, but third scan showed clean
Kauffman claims she's been investigating scrubbed logs for 6 months
Kauffman was off-site (Beijing conference) when Aria's emergency session occurred
Someone used Kauffman's credentials to authorize Aria's session
Security footage shows someone resembling Kauffman accessing construction chamber
Original Aria Chen died in vault breach 2 years ago trying to stop unauthorized access
Kauffman gave her data chip with evidence of systematic manipulation going back 5 years
Kauffman suggested working with black market criminals
Received anonymous message with Undercity coordinates: 'We should talk'
does_not_know: Whether Kauffman is sincere or testing her
Whether Kauffman is real or Composite herself
Who sent the anonymous coordinates message
Whether this is recruitment or trap
Whether she's truly a Composite or just memory-edited Original
decisions_made: Told Kauffman the truth about 17 modified memories
Revealed knowledge of Kauffman's authorization on emergency session
Deleted anonymous message but memorized coordinates
Decided to go to Undercity coordinates
Committed to working outside official channels
aria_chen.internal_conflict: Trust Kauffman or suspect her? Truth or trap? System loyalty vs. independent investigation fully chosen now
aria_chen.investigation_progress: Has Kauffman's evidence chip, has Undercity contact coordinates, moving toward black market
possessions: Kauffman's data chip with 5 years of evidence

revealed_information: Claims she's been investigating scrubbed logs for 6 months
Found irregularities in Aria's backup, then they disappeared
Was in Beijing when Aria's emergency session occurred
Someone impersonated her or used her credentials
Knows Original Aria died in vault breach 2 years ago
Has collected evidence of systematic manipulation over 5 years
Suggested working with black market criminals
Set up dead-drop protocol for communication
possible_interpretations: TRAP: Testing whether Aria will break protocol
COMPROMISED: Being controlled/watched, can't speak freely
COMPOSITE: Created to manage/monitor Aria's investigation
director_sarah_kauffman.relationship_to_aria: Supervisor, possible ally, possible antagonist, ambiguous
director_sarah_kauffman.voice_markers: Professional, calculated, maternal concern mixed with strategic thinking

revealed_to_reader: Kauffman detected irregularities in Aria's backup that disappeared
Kauffman claims 6 months of investigation into scrubbed logs
Someone impersonated Kauffman 2 years ago (or she's lying)
Original Aria died in vault breach attempting to stop unauthorized access
Security footage of 'Kauffman' accessing construction chamber at 3:47 AM
Systematic memory manipulation going back 5 years (per Kauffman's claim)
Dead-drop protocols exist from old vault emergency procedures
Kauffman gave Aria physical data chip with evidence
Anonymous message with Undercity coordinates sent to Aria
Original Aria may have been investigating same conspiracy before death
Kauffman's ambiguous trustworthiness - could be sincere or trap

planted.element: Kauffman's data chip with 5 years of evidence
planted.payoff_chapter: Ch04-06, possibly compared with Marcus's evidence
planted.significance: Aria can verify claims, compare sources

planted.element: Original Aria died trying to stop unauthorized access
planted.significance: This Aria mirrors original's dedication to truth

How Aria will coordinate evidence without surveillance

planted.element: Vault breach 2 years ago where Original Aria died
planted.significance: What was she trying to stop? Who killed her?

active_tensions: Is Kauffman sincere investigator or conspiracy member?
Who sent the anonymous Undercity coordinates?
Will Aria walk into a trap going to coordinates?
Is Kauffman herself a Composite replacement?
What's on Kauffman's data chip - real evidence or fabricated?
Surveillance risk if Aria coordinates with Kauffman

vault_security: Director can run secondary scans on staff backups
Someone can correct quantum irregularities between scans
Biometric data can be spoofed for authorization
Security footage can be accessed for historical sessions
Dead-drop protocols exist from pre-network era
composite_possibilities: Composites can be created to impersonate specific people
Systematic manipulation documented going back 5+ years
Original person can die while Composite replacement continues
investigation_methods: Physical data chips avoid network surveillance
Off-site alibis can be verified through hotel/flight records

atmosphere.tone: Paranoid negotiation, ambiguous alliances, deepening conspiracy
atmosphere.mood: Uncertain trust, testing each other, layers of deception
sensory_details: Corner office with dual views - towers and Undercity
Neural implant glowing blue with active connection
Biometric readings tracking Aria's heart rate
Morning sun painting gold and shadow
visual_motifs: Two worlds visible from one office (dual realities)
Physical chip vs network data (old vs new trust)
Elevator descent from truth to uncertainty

continuity_notes.timeline: Day 2, morning after ch02 evening, 0800 meeting as scheduled
continuity_notes.character_knowledge: Aria knows ch01-02 info, gains Kauffman's claims and evidence
continuity_notes.callbacks: Dead-drop server from ch01 connected to dead-drop protocols, Kauffman meeting from ch02 message

foreshadowing: Kauffman may be Composite herself (impersonation 2 years ago suspicious)
Original Aria's death connects to current conspiracy
Systematic manipulation for 5+ years suggests large-scale program
Anonymous coordinates leading to black market contact (Marcus)
Someone monitoring Aria's investigation to send coordinates
Kauffman's true nature will be revealed (ch12 or 17)

character_development.aria: From isolated investigator to accepting Kauffman's alliance (uncertain), committed to working outside system, willing to trust criminals, accepting she must break all rules
character_development.kauffman: Introduced as ambiguous figure - mentor or manipulator?, shows complexity and strategic thinking, potentially sincere or elaborate trap

thematic_exploration.trust_in_systems: Official channels can't be trusted, must work outside protocol
thematic_exploration.layers_of_deception: Everyone could be impersonation, multiple levels of conspiracy
thematic_exploration.consciousness_autonomy: If Aria is Composite, she's thinking independently - program unstable
thematic_exploration.legacy_and_echo: Original Aria's death haunts investigation, this Aria continuing her work

chapter_function.plot: Kauffman meeting reveals conspiracy scope, provides evidence, directs Aria toward black market, anonymous contact established
chapter_function.character: Kauffman introduced as complex ambiguous ally/antagonist, Aria commits fully to independent investigation
chapter_function.world: Systematic manipulation revealed, impersonation possible, dead-drop protocols, vault breach history
chapter_function.theme: Can't verify anyone's authenticity, must act despite uncertainty, legacy of Original Aria
chapter_function.reader_engagement: Major twist - Kauffman claims to be investigating too, ambiguous trustworthiness, multiple interpretations possible
